channel.title: NPR Topics: National
channel.description: NPR coverage of national news, U.S. politics, elections, business, arts, culture, health and science, and technology. Subscribe to the NPR Nation RSS feed.
channel.copyright: Copyright 2024 NPR - For Personal Use Only

item.title: Lindsey Vonn says she suffered 'complex tibia fracture' in her Olympic downhill crash
item.description: The 41-year-old star said her torn ACL was not a factor in her crash. "While yesterday did not end the way I had hoped, and despite the intense physical pain it caused, I have no regrets," she wrote.
item.content:encoded:
The 41-year-old star said her torn ACL was not a factor in her crash. "While yesterday did not end the way I had hoped, and despite the intense physical pain it caused, I have no regrets," she wrote.

(Image credit: Screengrab by IOC via Getty Images)
item.dc:creator: Becky Sullivan

item.title: AI complicates proof of life in the search for Savannah Guthrie's mother
item.description: The FBI says AI is complicating the idea of a proof of life message in the search for Savannah Guthrie's mom. Experts say AI needs just a few short clips of a person to render a convincing fake.
item.content:encoded: The FBI says AI is complicating the idea of a proof of life message in the search for Savannah Guthrie's mom. Experts say AI needs just a few short clips of a person to render a convincing fake.
item.dc:creator: Kat Lonsdorf

item.title: In Oregon, a dog competition tries to get more dogs into truffle hunting
item.description: Organizers of a truffle dog championship for amateurs in Oregon hope it will draw more people to truffle hunting with dogs, which some experts say could improve the Pacific Northwest's truffle crop.
item.content:encoded: Organizers of a truffle dog championship for amateurs in Oregon hope it will draw more people to truffle hunting with dogs, which some experts say could improve the Pacific Northwest's truffle crop.
item.dc:creator: Crystal Ligori

item.title: One of Time Square's last dive bars is facing eviction
item.description: The dive bar Jimmy's Corner has been a Times Square institution for over 50 years. Now it faces eviction.
item.content:encoded: The dive bar Jimmy's Corner has been a Times Square institution for over 50 years. Now it faces eviction.
item.dc:creator: Henry Larson

item.title: Nancy Guthrie search enters its second week as a purported deadline looms
item.description: "This is very valuable to us, and we will pay," Savannah Guthrie said in a new video message, seeking to communicate with people who say they're holding her mother.
item.content:encoded:
"This is very valuable to us, and we will pay," Savannah Guthrie said in a new video message, seeking to communicate with people who say they're holding her mother.

(Image credit: Rebecca Noble)
item.dc:creator: Bill Chappell

item.title: 'End of Days' recalls the violent 1992 Ruby Ridge confrontation in Idaho
item.description: Author Chris Jennings talks the apocalyptic religious views that fueled the standoff between federal agents and the family of Randy Weaver — and the use of force rules that made it so deadly.
item.content:encoded: Author Chris Jennings talks the apocalyptic religious views that fueled the standoff between federal agents and the family of Randy Weaver — and the use of force rules that made it so deadly.
item.dc:creator: Dave Davies

item.title: The latest on the search for Nancy Guthrie. And, takeaways from Super Bowl 60
item.description: The search for Nancy Guthrie enters a second week. And, the Seattle Seahawks win Super Bowl 60, beating the New England Patriots 29-13. Here are the highlights from the big game.
item.content:encoded:
The search for Nancy Guthrie enters a second week. And, the Seattle Seahawks win Super Bowl 60, beating the New England Patriots 29-13. Here are the highlights from the big game.

(Image credit: Rebecca Noble)
item.dc:creator: Brittney Melton

item.title: 5 glaring warning signs for Republicans in this year's midterm elections
item.description: Here's why Republicans are facing an uphill battle, particularly for retaining control of the House.
item.content:encoded:
Here's why Republicans are facing an uphill battle, particularly for retaining control of the House.

(Image credit: Nathan Howard)
item.dc:creator: Domenico Montanaro

item.title: U.S. skater Connor McDermott-Mostowy joins record number of out LGBTQ Winter Olympians
item.description: When U.S. speedskater Connor McDermott-Mostowy makes his Winter Olympic debut in Milan, he'll join a record number of out LGBTQ athletes. But of the 46 out athletes, only 11 are men.
item.content:encoded:
When U.S. speedskater Connor McDermott-Mostowy makes his Winter Olympic debut in Milan, he'll join a record number of out LGBTQ athletes. But of the 46 out athletes, only 11 are men.

(Image credit: Matthias Schrader)
item.dc:creator: Rolando Arrieta

item.title: Morning news brief
item.description: The search for Nancy Guthrie enters its second week, Ghislaine Maxwell to testify before Congress Monday, the Seahawks pummel the Patriots, taking home Super Bowl LX title.
item.content:encoded: The search for Nancy Guthrie enters its second week, Ghislaine Maxwell to testify before Congress Monday, the Seahawks pummel the Patriots, taking home Super Bowl LX title.
item.dc:creator: Michel Martin
